resources.string: This device is connected to your account:
With this connector app you can synchronize your device\'s calendar with your Meetin.gs account and import your calendar events to Meetin.gs.
Not registered with Meetin.gs? Create an account here.
We\'ve sent you a pin code to this address:
Please use a valid email address
We could not find an account with this email address. Would you like to create a new account?
Disconnecting your device\'s calendar will remove imported information from Meetin.gs.
